translations: adj.不知道的，未察觉到的，未意识到的

phrs.translation: 没觉察到，没有意识到；不知道

sentences.sentence: He was blithely unaware of the trouble he'd caused.
sentences.translation: 他漫不经心，丝毫没有察觉他惹的麻烦。

sentences.sentence: She was sublimely unaware of the trouble she had caused.
sentences.translation: 她压根儿没察觉自己闹出了乱子。

sentences.sentence: She was unaware that I could see her.
